parameter.name: wrapper_class
parameter.label: Wrapper Class
parameter.description: This class is used to make owner style for the widget wrapper.

parameter.name: inner_class
parameter.label: Inner Class
parameter.description: This class is used to make owner style for the widget inner.

parameter.name: title
parameter.label: Title
parameter.description: This tile will be showed as header of widget block. Empty to disable

parameter.name: title_class
parameter.label: Widget Title Class
parameter.description: This class is used to make owner style for the title.

parameter.name: icon_class
parameter.label: Icon Class
parameter.description: If you use Icon Class, The image at bellow will be not used. you can use icon from font-awesome, for example: fa-thumbs-o-up . Find more icons at here: http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/icons/

parameter.name: stylecls
parameter.label: Icon Style
parameter.description: These classes are bootstrap typo contextual color classes.

parameter.name: font_size
parameter.label: Icon Font Size
parameter.description: Input Font Size for Icon. For example: 32px.

parameter.name: file
parameter.label: Image File
parameter.description:
Enter image path or use holder image (ex: holder.js/300x200). Or input image name with path.
Example: image_name.jpg(png|gif|jpeg|svg) or subfolder/image_name.jpg(png|gif|jpeg|svg).The "subfolder" is child folder in your_webroot_folder/pub/media/

parameter.name: link
parameter.label: Link for image icon or font icon
parameter.description: Input the link for image icon or font icon. Empty for hide
